author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Acxiom Announces Change To Facebook Relationship
text:
March 28 (Reuters) - Acxiom Corp:
* ACXIOM ANNOUNCES CHANGE TO FACEBOOK RELATIONSHIP * ‍WAS INFORMED BY FACEBOOK, THAT FACEBOOK PARTNER CATEGORIES WILL BE DISCONTINUED OVER NEXT SEVERAL MONTHS​
* ‍ACXIOM DOES NOT EXPECT THIS CHANGE TO IMPACT ITS FISCAL 2018 GUIDANCE​
* ‍ACXIOM NOW EXPECTS FY 2019 TOTAL REVENUE AND PROFITABILITY TO BE NEGATIVELY IMPACTED BY AS MUCH AS $25 MILLION​
* CO CONTINUES TO EXPECT ITS LIVERAMP SEGMENT TO GROW BY AT LEAST 30% YEAR-OVER-YEAR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
